changelog.release_notes:
- changed the scope of the battery indicator
- changed menu icon

- support for Pebble Time Round 
- added battery indicator: the line separator acts as a battery indicator 
- changes in the layout 
- changed the BT indicator for Aplite: The line separator changes thickness instead of color 
- code optimization
- Added Bluetooth Connectivity Indicator (Line Separator, changing color on Peblle Time or On/Off on Pebble)
A touch of color for Pebble Time.
Version 2.1 - Bug fix (issue with selecting the correct font for the next layer)

Watchface look change - text is now centered and hours and minutes are divided by line.
Features dynamic font size change during hours "eleven" (11 and 23) and "twelve" (12 and 24) to accomodate the extra length of these words in the Bulgarian Language

description:
Bulgarian Language Text Watch.
This is the typical Text Watch using Bulgarian Language and a custom Cyrilic Font.
The Hour font will dynamically change size to accommodate for lengthier Bulgarian words such as the numbers "11" and "12".
A touch of Color on Pebble Time!
The Line separator acts as Bluetooth Connectivity indicator (Red - Connected, Blue - disconnected) and also as a "bar graph" battery meter (shrinking as battery drains)
